TopicTitle: So a failed launch and emergency ditch turns out to be quite entertaining...

Articles.Content:
A little video I made about one of the new features. Some people might want to find out about it for themselves though, so if you are one of those people, stop reading now.

Anyway, I was relaunching my Mun rocket, and for some reason it handled extremely poorly (must\'ve changed something) forcing me to detach the capsule and ditch it in the ocean. So while the three kerbals are gently bobbing up and down on the waves and awaiting rescue, Bill has a bright idea. This is the result:

http://youtu.be/jB7ccG0yz0M

Kudos to the dev team for putting that in, adds a real nice touch the game.
